event.title: did not become an official city until 1897

data.event: Woodstock is divided into three main sections: Historic Downtown Towne Lake The Ridgewalk line (up and coming) Although the first settlers called their new home Woodstock, the community did not become an official city until 1897.
Early settlements sprang up around waterways, and as the railroad and train depot became a reality in 1879, the town centered around these landmarks.
